descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**Rewrite the Past. Save the Future.** Step into an adrenaline-fueled VR shooter where survival means becoming immortal. Control a blazing Phoenix in your hands, and fight alongside Jackie, a genetically enhanced janitor bound to Firestorm by fate. Together, you’ll battle through the collapsing Slipstream multiverse.

**A Sci-fi Saga Across Time:** Fly from scorched wastelands to dazzling future cities in a race against extinction. Every location is a battlefield - and a piece of the narrative puzzle. 
[media]

**Enemies Everywhere:** Mutants, Scavengers, Leviathans and Drones... relentless foes lurk around every corner. Blast your way through heart-pounding VR combat.
[media]

**Total Immersion. Total Action:** Fly, dodge, and shoot in this physical, action-packed VR shooter ‘shmup that’ll give you an addictive rhythm rush.
[media]

**Strategic Shooting:** Toggle between realms to absorb enemy bullets, bend reality to your will.
[media]

**Power Up or Perish:** Collect gold flames to unlock game-changing upgrades: smart bombs, quad fireballs, shields, extended reach, faster regeneration, and flamethrower boosts.
[media]

**Feel the Fight:** Move to the upbeat soundtrack by legendary composer Grant Kirkhope. Amplify the immersion with bHaptics TactSuit, TactSleeve and TactVisor to feel every explosion and hit in your bones.

**Buy The Phoenix Gene today to become a Slipstream Master!** or try before you buy with our **Free Trial**.
[media]
